1.description: tells the bash shell to do nothing for 60 minutes, then to request the process labeled spotify to gracefully shut down.

2.command: adb shell svc usb setFunctions rndis
2.description: tells an android phone to enable usb tethering using ADB

2.command: adb shell svc usb setFunctions none
2.description: tells a phone to disable usb tethering using ADB
